headline: Livestreamed Earnings Could Be a Game Changer for Opendoor Technologies (OPEN)
summary: Opendoor Technologies recently announced it will transform its Q3 2025 earnings presentation into a livestreamed “Financial Open House” on multiple platforms, including Robinhood, with a live Q&A session featuring CEO Kaz Nejatian and Interim CFO Christy Schwartz. This shift aims to increase transparency and direct engagement with both retail and institutional investors, highlighting the company’s evolving approach to shareholder communications. The interactive earnings format and expanding...
